Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 69th/Hamilton
ShortDescription: Eastbound 67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 67th, Damen and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 67th, Damen and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at  103rd/Washtenaw
ShortDescription: #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Western, 99th, Kedzie, due to street blockage near 103rd/Washtenaw.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Western, 99th, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Washtenaw.

Allow extra travel time.
